<Link id="l00128" /><CodeLine lineNumber="128"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Maximum alloca size than can fit registers. Reserve 16 registers.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00223" /><CodeLine lineNumber="223"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Allow unroll runtime for loop:\\n&quot;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00225" /><CodeLine lineNumber="225"><span class="doxyHighlight">        UP.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/targettransforminfo/unrollingpreferences/#ae31307b4efc5ce5311752041e7ff7cdc">Runtime</a> = <a href="#a48f3ae6a4cb04a16e23271d3ca5a68df">UnrollRuntimeLocal</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00226" /><CodeLine lineNumber="226"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00227" /><CodeLine lineNumber="227"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00228" /><CodeLine lineNumber="228"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Check if GEP depends on a value defined by this loop itself.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00229" /><CodeLine lineNumber="229"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> HasLoopDef = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00230" /><CodeLine lineNumber="230"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab471937b9a227e70c7fe8bd9604014d6">Op</a> : <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/hexagon/hexagoncommongep-cpp/#ad532e8710e50302e0a376b61c91fa91d">GEP</a>-&gt;operands()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00231" /><CodeLine lineNumber="231"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction">Instruction</a> &#42;Inst = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a22eeee01734061ac1b31ccd994c49eef">dyn&#95;cast&lt;Instruction&gt;</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab471937b9a227e70c7fe8bd9604014d6">Op</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00232" /><CodeLine lineNumber="232"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!Inst || L-&gt;isLoopInvariant(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab471937b9a227e70c7fe8bd9604014d6">Op</a>))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00233" /><CodeLine lineNumber="233"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00234" /><CodeLine lineNumber="234"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00235" /><CodeLine lineNumber="235"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a61d13d6824ec46c31260a4fd0997eda0">llvm::any&#95;of</a>(L-&gt;getSubLoops(), &#91;Inst&#93;(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loop">Loop</a>&#42; SubLoop) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00236" /><CodeLine lineNumber="236"><span class="doxyHighlight">             return SubLoop-&gt;contains(Inst); &#125;))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00237" /><CodeLine lineNumber="237"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00238" /><CodeLine lineNumber="238"><span class="doxyHighlight">        HasLoopDef = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00239" /><CodeLine lineNumber="239"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">break</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00240" /><CodeLine lineNumber="240"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00241" /><CodeLine lineNumber="241"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!HasLoopDef)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00242" /><CodeLine lineNumber="242"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00243" /><CodeLine lineNumber="243"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00244" /><CodeLine lineNumber="244"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We want to do whatever we can to limit the number of alloca</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00245" /><CodeLine lineNumber="245"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// instructions that make it through to the code generator.  allocas</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00246" /><CodeLine lineNumber="246"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// require us to use indirect addressing, which is slow and prone to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00247" /><CodeLine lineNumber="247"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// compiler bugs.  If this loop does an address calculation on an</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00248" /><CodeLine lineNumber="248"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// alloca ptr, then we want to use a higher than normal loop unroll</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00249" /><CodeLine lineNumber="249"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// threshold. This will give SROA a better chance to eliminate these</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00250" /><CodeLine lineNumber="250"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// allocas.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00251" /><CodeLine lineNumber="251"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00252" /><CodeLine lineNumber="252"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We also want to have more unrolling for local memory to let ds</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00253" /><CodeLine lineNumber="253"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// instructions with different offsets combine.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00254" /><CodeLine lineNumber="254"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00255" /><CodeLine lineNumber="255"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Don&#39;t use the maximum allowed value here as it will make some</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00256" /><CodeLine lineNumber="256"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// programs way too big.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00257" /><CodeLine lineNumber="257"><span class="doxyHighlight">      UP.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/targettransforminfo/unrollingpreferences/#a21e7febf468c370793f606da5cd0e6fe">Threshold</a> = Threshold;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00258" /><CodeLine lineNumber="258"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Set unroll threshold &quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;&lt; Threshold</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00259" /><CodeLine lineNumber="259"><span class="doxyHighlight">                        &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot; for loop:\\n&quot;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00260" /><CodeLine lineNumber="260"><span class="doxyHighlight">                        &lt;&lt; &#42;L &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot; due to &quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;&lt; &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/hexagon/hexagoncommongep-cpp/#ad532e8710e50302e0a376b61c91fa91d">GEP</a> &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightCharLiteral">&#39;\\n&#39;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00261" /><CodeLine lineNumber="261"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (UP.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/targettransforminfo/unrollingpreferences/#a21e7febf468c370793f606da5cd0e6fe">Threshold</a> &gt;= MaxBoost)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00262" /><CodeLine lineNumber="262"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00263" /><CodeLine lineNumber="263"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00264" /><CodeLine lineNumber="264"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00265" /><CodeLine lineNumber="265"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If we got a GEP in a small BB from inner loop then increase max trip</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00266" /><CodeLine lineNumber="266"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// count to analyze for better estimation cost in unroll</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00431" /><CodeLine lineNumber="431"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// A (multi-)dword access at an address == 2 (mod 4) will be decomposed by the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00432" /><CodeLine lineNumber="432"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// hardware into byte accesses. If you assume all alignments are equally</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00435" /><CodeLine lineNumber="435"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a59f98bbb1f440db8d5db1c8b5bd819f6">MinAlign</a> == <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/align">Align</a>(2))</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00437" /><CodeLine lineNumber="437"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00438" /><CodeLine lineNumber="438"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Not all subtargets have 128-bit DS instructions, and we currently don&#39;t</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00439" /><CodeLine lineNumber="439"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// form them by default.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00440" /><CodeLine lineNumber="440"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (SrcAddrSpace == <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/amdgpuas/#a899ad5bfccfc22965a6714929a3dfae1a77b1c964e2ff99057bf5e75140457abe">AMDGPUAS::LOCAL&#95;ADDRESS</a> ||</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00441" /><CodeLine lineNumber="441"><span class="doxyHighlight">      SrcAddrSpace == <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/amdgpuas/#a899ad5bfccfc22965a6714929a3dfae1a5b71ba6fa435ec288aba849e113721a7">AMDGPUAS::REGION&#95;ADDRESS</a> ||</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00442" /><CodeLine lineNumber="442"><span class="doxyHighlight">      DestAddrSpace == <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/amdgpuas/#a899ad5bfccfc22965a6714929a3dfae1a77b1c964e2ff99057bf5e75140457abe">AMDGPUAS::LOCAL&#95;ADDRESS</a> ||</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00443" /><CodeLine lineNumber="443"><span class="doxyHighlight">      DestAddrSpace == <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/amdgpuas/#a899ad5bfccfc22965a6714929a3dfae1a5b71ba6fa435ec288aba849e113721a7">AMDGPUAS::REGION&#95;ADDRESS</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00444" /><CodeLine lineNumber="444"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/fixedvectortype/#af9a870d5df50fe0133a410b7c9114c80">FixedVectorType::get</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/type/#a30dd396c5b40cd86c1591872e574ccdf">Type::getInt32Ty</a>(Context), 2);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00445" /><CodeLine lineNumber="445"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00446" /><CodeLine lineNumber="446"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00447" /><CodeLine lineNumber="447"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Global memory works best with 16-byte accesses.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00448" /><CodeLine lineNumber="448"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If the operation has a fixed known length that is large enough, it is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00449" /><CodeLine lineNumber="449"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// worthwhile to return an even wider type and let legalization lower it into</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00450" /><CodeLine lineNumber="450"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// multiple accesses, effectively unrolling the memcpy loop. Private memory</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00451" /><CodeLine lineNumber="451"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// also hits this, although accesses may be decomposed.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00452" /><CodeLine lineNumber="452"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00453" /><CodeLine lineNumber="453"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Don&#39;t unroll if Length is not a constant, since unrolling leads to worse</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00454" /><CodeLine lineNumber="454"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// performance for length values that are smaller or slightly larger than the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00455" /><CodeLine lineNumber="455"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// total size of the type returned here. Mitigating that would require a more</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00456" /><CodeLine lineNumber="456"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// complex lowering for variable-length memcpy and memmove.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00457" /><CodeLine lineNumber="457"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> I32EltsInVector = 4;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00458" /><CodeLine lineNumber="458"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="#af843c51255e07629b549e19cb11a369a">MemcpyLoopUnroll</a> &gt; 0 &amp;&amp; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a92ca992e52dddc420f4b069cae06dfbe">isa&lt;ConstantInt&gt;</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878af6d9f1c7b49b7601fae6a545002a6763">Length</a>))</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00652" /><CodeLine lineNumber="652"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!Args.empty() &amp;&amp; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/patternmatch/#a25d956d9e0beadd47ce4bc255dfa811d">match</a>(Args&#91;0&#93;, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/patternmatch/#a8f87f39b5e0dedd0793bb3a450f463cf">PatternMatch::m&#95;FPOne</a>())) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00653" /><CodeLine lineNumber="653"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// TODO: This is more complicated, unsafe flags etc.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00654" /><CodeLine lineNumber="654"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ((SLT == MVT::f32 &amp;&amp; !HasFP32Denormals) ||</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00656" /><CodeLine lineNumber="656"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> LT.first &#42; getQuarterRateInstrCost(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/costmodel-cpp/#a162d8b2b3865594d1e14d828d2b8336a">CostKind</a>) &#42; NElts;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00657" /><CodeLine lineNumber="657"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00658" /><CodeLine lineNumber="658"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00659" /><CodeLine lineNumber="659"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00660" /><CodeLine lineNumber="660"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (SLT == MVT::f16 &amp;&amp; ST-&gt;has16BitInsts()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00661" /><CodeLine lineNumber="661"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// 2 x v&#95;cvt&#95;f32&#95;f16</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00662" /><CodeLine lineNumber="662"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// f32 rcp</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00663" /><CodeLine lineNumber="663"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// f32 fmul</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00664" /><CodeLine lineNumber="664"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// v&#95;cvt&#95;f16&#95;f32</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00665" /><CodeLine lineNumber="665"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// f16 div&#95;fixup</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00666" /><CodeLine lineNumber="666"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a19921a3ceb99548f498d3df118eda9ed">Cost</a> =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00667" /><CodeLine lineNumber="667"><span class="doxyHighlight">          4 &#42; getFullRateInstrCost() + 2 &#42; getQuarterRateInstrCost(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/costmodel-cpp/#a162d8b2b3865594d1e14d828d2b8336a">CostKind</a>);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00669" /><CodeLine lineNumber="669"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00670" /><CodeLine lineNumber="670"></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00672" /><CodeLine lineNumber="672"><span class="doxyHighlight">                            TLI-&gt;getTargetMachine().Options.UnsafeFPMath)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00673" /><CodeLine lineNumber="673"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Fast unsafe fdiv lowering:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00674" /><CodeLine lineNumber="674"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// f32 rcp</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00675" /><CodeLine lineNumber="675"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// f32 fmul</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00676" /><CodeLine lineNumber="676"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a19921a3ceb99548f498d3df118eda9ed">Cost</a> = getQuarterRateInstrCost(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/costmodel-cpp/#a162d8b2b3865594d1e14d828d2b8336a">CostKind</a>) + getFullRateInstrCost();</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00681" /><CodeLine lineNumber="681"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// 4 more v&#95;cvt&#95;&#42; insts without f16 insts support</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00874" /><CodeLine lineNumber="874"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00875" /><CodeLine lineNumber="875"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Extracts are just reads of a subregister, so are free. Inserts are</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00876" /><CodeLine lineNumber="876"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// considered free because we don&#39;t want to have any cost for scalarizing</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00877" /><CodeLine lineNumber="877"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// operations, and we don&#39;t have to copy into a different register class.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00878" /><CodeLine lineNumber="878"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00879" /><CodeLine lineNumber="879"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Dynamic indexing isn&#39;t free and is best avoided.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00880" /><CodeLine lineNumber="880"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Index == ~0u ? 2 : 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00881" /><CodeLine lineNumber="881"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00882" /><CodeLine lineNumber="882"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">default</span><span class="doxyHighlight">:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00883" /><CodeLine lineNumber="883"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicttiimplbase/#a27bfcb3dd99fa7a7ca8dc24eeac6e8e6">BaseT::getVectorInstrCost</a>(Opcode, ValTy, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/costmodel-cpp/#a162d8b2b3865594d1e14d828d2b8336a">CostKind</a>, Index, Op0, Op1);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00884" /><CodeLine lineNumber="884"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00885" /><CodeLine lineNumber="885"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00886" /><CodeLine lineNumber="886"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00887" /><CodeLine lineNumber="887"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Analyze if the results of inline asm are divergent. If \\p Indices is empty,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00888" /><CodeLine lineNumber="888"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// this is analyzing the collective result of all output registers. Otherwise,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00889" /><CodeLine lineNumber="889"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// this is only querying a specific result index if this returns multiple</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00890" /><CodeLine lineNumber="890"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// registers in a struct.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00891" /><CodeLine lineNumber="891" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/gcnttiimpl/#a3e874f5073fd59211348a2ea23e9d0ce"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/gcnttiimpl/#a3e874f5073fd59211348a2ea23e9d0ce">GCNTTIImpl::isInlineAsmSourceOfDivergence</a>(</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00893" /><CodeLine lineNumber="893"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// TODO: Handle complex extract indices</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00947" /><CodeLine lineNumber="947"></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00950" /><CodeLine lineNumber="950" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/gcnttiimpl/#adcaf33f0c60678d66d47c074de4cc46a"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/gcnttiimpl/#adcaf33f0c60678d66d47c074de4cc46a">GCNTTIImpl::isSourceOfDivergence</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;V)</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword"> const </span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00951" /><CodeLine lineNumber="951"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/argument">Argument</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#a2e38c85003a042421cde1647632d0b72">A</a> = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a22eeee01734061ac1b31ccd994c49eef">dyn&#95;cast&lt;Argument&gt;</a>(V))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00952" /><CodeLine lineNumber="952"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> !<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/amdgpu/#a5d7d70152f1d904df03f92ba26418387">AMDGPU::isArgPassedInSGPR</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#a2e38c85003a042421cde1647632d0b72">A</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00953" /><CodeLine lineNumber="953"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00954" /><CodeLine lineNumber="954"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Loads from the private and flat address spaces are divergent, because</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00955" /><CodeLine lineNumber="955"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// threads can execute the load instruction with the same inputs and get</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00956" /><CodeLine lineNumber="956"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// different results.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00957" /><CodeLine lineNumber="957"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00958" /><CodeLine lineNumber="958"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// All other loads are not divergent, because if threads issue loads with the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00959" /><CodeLine lineNumber="959"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// same arguments, they will always get the same result.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00960" /><CodeLine lineNumber="960"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loadinst">LoadInst</a> &#42;Load = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a22eeee01734061ac1b31ccd994c49eef">dyn&#95;cast&lt;LoadInst&gt;</a>(V))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00961" /><CodeLine lineNumber="961"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Load-&gt;getPointerAddressSpace() == <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/amdgpuas/#a899ad5bfccfc22965a6714929a3dfae1aec164f45437d8827346f2d8ec645479a">AMDGPUAS::PRIVATE&#95;ADDRESS</a> ||</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00962" /><CodeLine lineNumber="962"><span class="doxyHighlight">           Load-&gt;getPointerAddressSpace() == <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/amdgpuas/#a899ad5bfccfc22965a6714929a3dfae1aaa1e27e4fc68e5706a4b7bbaed447c14">AMDGPUAS::FLAT&#95;ADDRESS</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00963" /><CodeLine lineNumber="963"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00964" /><CodeLine lineNumber="964"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Atomics are divergent because they are executed sequentially: when an</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00965" /><CodeLine lineNumber="965"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// atomic operation refers to the same address in each thread, then each</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00966" /><CodeLine lineNumber="966"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// thread after the first sees the value written by the previous thread as</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00967" /><CodeLine lineNumber="967"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// original value.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00968" /><CodeLine lineNumber="968"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a92ca992e52dddc420f4b069cae06dfbe">isa&lt;AtomicRMWInst&gt;</a>(V) || <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a92ca992e52dddc420f4b069cae06dfbe">isa&lt;AtomicCmpXchgInst&gt;</a>(V))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00969" /><CodeLine lineNumber="969"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00970" /><CodeLine lineNumber="970"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00971" /><CodeLine lineNumber="971"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/intrinsicinst">IntrinsicInst</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/intrinsic">Intrinsic</a> = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a22eeee01734061ac1b31ccd994c49eef">dyn&#95;cast&lt;IntrinsicInst&gt;</a>(V)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00972" /><CodeLine lineNumber="972"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/intrinsic">Intrinsic</a>-&gt;getIntrinsicID() == Intrinsic::read&#95;register)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00973" /><CodeLine lineNumber="973"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/gcnttiimpl/#a3f1861e30cebca3c33d71a2e73de0c5b">isReadRegisterSourceOfDivergence</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/intrinsic">Intrinsic</a>);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00976" /><CodeLine lineNumber="976"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00977" /><CodeLine lineNumber="977"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00978" /><CodeLine lineNumber="978"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Assume all function calls are a source of divergence.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01002" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1002"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// In most cases TID / wavefrontsize is uniform.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01003" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1003"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01004" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1004"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// However, if a kernel has uneven dimesions we can have a value of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01005" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1005"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// workitem-id-x divided by the wavefrontsize non-uniform. For example</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01006" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1006"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// dimensions (65, 2) will have workitems with address (64, 0) and (0, 1)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01007" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1007"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// packed into a same wave which gives 1 and 0 after the division by 64</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01008" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1008"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// respectively.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01009" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1009"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01010" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1010"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// FIXME: limit it to 1D kernels only, although that shall be possible</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01011" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1011"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// to perform this optimization is the size of the X dimension is a power</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01012" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1012"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// of 2, we just do not currently have infrastructure to query it.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01288" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1288"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The cost of passing function arguments through the stack:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01289" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1289"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  1 instruction to put a function argument on the stack in the caller.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01290" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1290"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  1 instruction to take a function argument from the stack in callee.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01291" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1291"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  1 instruction is explicitly take care of data dependencies in callee</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01292" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1292"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  function.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01301" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1301"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The penalty cost is computed relative to the cost of instructions and does</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01302" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1302"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// not model any storage costs.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01355" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1355"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01356" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1356"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Below the cutoff, assume that the private memory objects would be</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01357" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1357"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// optimized</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01358" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1358"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> AllocaSize = <a href="#aa883d40ffa8836538699a7974632d0a0">getCallArgsTotalAllocaSize</a>(CB, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicttiimplbase/#aec0b8db50138e2a68aca36959b6692a5">DL</a>);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01360" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1360"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01361" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1361"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01362" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1362"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Above the cutoff, we give a cost to each private memory object</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01363" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1363"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// depending its size. If the array can be optimized by SROA this cost is not</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01364" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1364"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// added to the total-cost in the inliner cost analysis.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01365" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1365"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01366" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1366"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We choose the total cost of the alloca such that their sum cancels the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01367" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1367"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// bonus given in the threshold (ArgAllocaCost).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01368" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1368"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01369" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1369"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   Cost&#95;Alloca&#95;0 + ... + Cost&#95;Alloca&#95;N == ArgAllocaCost</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01370" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1370"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01371" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1371"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Awkwardly, the ArgAllocaCost bonus is multiplied by threshold-multiplier,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01372" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1372"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the single-bb bonus and the vector-bonus.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01373" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1373"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01374" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1374"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We compensate the first two multipliers, by repeating logic from the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01375" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1375"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// inliner-cost in here. The vector-bonus is 0 on AMDGPU.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01376" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1376"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static&#95;assert</span><span class="doxyHighlight">(InlinerVectorBonusPercent == 0, </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;vector bonus assumed to be 0&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01377" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1377"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Threshold = <a href="#a26e3547a49b58b4e815ff5c73cad7865">ArgAllocaCost</a> &#42; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/gcnttiimpl/#a6c2338ef386c7d553b00c8bece389fc4">getInliningThresholdMultiplier</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01378" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1378"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01379" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1379"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> SingleBB = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7dc3069afa2ce5ea62ac2eb183e51c00">none&#95;of</a>(&#42;CB-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/callbase/#a2b1ae7cf1bafdd43d1fee4c6ad0a2913">getCalledFunction</a>(), &#91;&#93;(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &amp;BB) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01380" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1380"><span class="doxyHighlight">    return BB.getTerminator()-&gt;getNumSuccessors() &gt; 1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01381" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1381"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01382" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1382"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (SingleBB) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01383" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1383"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Threshold += Threshold / 2;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01384" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1384"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01385" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1385"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01386" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1386"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ArgAllocaSize = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicttiimplbase/#aec0b8db50138e2a68aca36959b6692a5">DL</a>.getTypeAllocSize(AI-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/allocainst/#a9b5ec84ea363eca9e35ddca20a5313af">getAllocatedType</a>());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01387" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1387"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01388" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1388"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Attribute the bonus proportionally to the alloca size</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01389" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1389"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> AllocaThresholdBonus = (Threshold &#42; ArgAllocaSize) / AllocaSize;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01390" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1390"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01391" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1391"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> AllocaThresholdBonus;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01392" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1392"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01393" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1393"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01394" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1394" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/gcnttiimpl/#a74357df9d89b3b32fbdc98894a64d776"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/gcnttiimpl/#a74357df9d89b3b32fbdc98894a64d776">GCNTTIImpl::getUnrollingPreferences</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loop">Loop</a> &#42;L, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scalarevolution">ScalarEvolution</a> &amp;SE,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01395" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1395"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                         <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/targettransforminfo/unrollingpreferences">TTI::UnrollingPreferences</a> &amp;UP,</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01397" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1397"><span class="doxyHighlight">  CommonTTI.getUnrollingPreferences(L, SE, UP, ORE);</span></CodeLine>
